title: IRC Archive for channel #xwiki on 17 March 2016 - XWiki
content:
<ujjwal> has quit

07:34 <abusenius\_> has quit  
07:38 <msmeria> has joined #xwiki  
07:46 <cjd\_> has quit  
07:46 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
08:03 <cjd> has quit  
08:09 <vmassol> has joined #xwiki  
08:56 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
08:57 <cjd> has joined #xwiki  
09:00 <KermitTheFragger> has joined #xwiki  
09:24 <woshilapin> has quit  
09:27 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
09:31 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
09:32 <mflorea> has joined #xwiki  
09:54 <vmassol> both is not working hmmm  
09:55 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
09:57 <martinus\_\_> Hi, I'm trying to use LDAP admin app... I get the message"LDAP authentication is not enabled. Please set LDAP as authentication service in xwiki.cfg" ,  while my xwiki.cfg seems correctly configured ( only those two options are set as told in doc http://pastebin.com/b3fzkk8L )  
09:58 <martinus\_\_> xwiki v6.4.4  
09:59 <martinus\_\_> I'm speaking about http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/LDAP+Application  
10:00 <martinus\_\_> tmortagne,  maybe you have a tip ?  
10:01 <tmortagne> martinus\_\_: sorry, on the phone, did you looked at what the message tells you: "Please set LDAP as authentication service in xwiki.cfg"  
10:01 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
10:01 <martinus\_\_> tmortagne, yes that's what I'm saying and why I'm asking now :)  
10:01 <tmortagne> make sire you restart after you modify xwiki.cfg  
10:01 <martinus\_\_> tmortagne, of course  
10:01 <tmortagne> s/sire/sure/  
10:02 <Enygma`> has joined #xwiki  
10:02 <tmortagne> then I don't have much more idea  
10:02 <martinus\_\_> tmortagne, okay...  
10:04 <martinus\_\_> tmortagne, could you tell me where I can read the source for the check that trigger this message ?  
10:05 <martinus\_\_> https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/tree/master/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-ldap/xwiki-platform-ldap-ui/  
10:05 <martinus\_\_> I'm gonna search further :)  
10:05 <martinus\_\_> thanks  
10:06 <tmortagne> XWiki.AdminLdapSheet I think  
10:07 <woshilapin> has joined #xwiki  
10:09 <gdelhumeau> mflorea evalica Enygma` vmassol tmortagne: my skype has a problem, I can't hear you anymore  
10:10 <tmortagne> gdelhumeau: we lost you completly actually  
10:11 <gdelhumeau> skype does not restart!  
10:11 <gdelhumeau> maybe we should use hangout  
10:11 <gdelhumeau> I reboot my compute, should be quick  
10:11 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
10:13 <gdelhumeau> has joined #xwiki  
10:14 <martinus\_\_> tmortagne, I think I understand, I've installed the app in a child before installing it in the main wiki :)  
10:14 <martinus\_\_> well, nothing prevent to do that :)  
10:14 <tmortagne> martinus\_\_: I'm not an expert of that application but I don't see why it would require to be on main wiki  
10:15 <tmortagne> at least for this error message you get  
10:15 <martinus\_\_> tmortagne, don't know, I'm going to test  
10:16 <tmortagne> ok  
10:24 <martinus\_\_> tmortagne, not better... maybe something wrong with isXWikiLDAPAuthenticator()  in https://github.com/xwiki/xwiki-platform/blob/0f5b636ea0eb6e761bc613bd8bc8995bd200f2d9/xwiki-platform-core/xwiki-platform-ldap/xwiki-platform-ldap-api/src/main/java/org/xwiki/ldap/script/LDAPScriptService.java , I don't know as I'm not expert :(  
10:25 <tmortagne> martinus\_\_: sorry don't have the time to check that right now, if you have the issue or standard instance of XWiki and you are sure the cfg is right you should create an issue on http://jira.xwiki.org  
10:25 <martinus\_\_> tmortagne, thanks, no pb.  
10:48 <acotiuga> has joined #xwiki  
10:51 <Slashman> has joined #xwiki  
10:59 <tmortagne> has quit  
11:01 <tmortagne> has joined #xwiki  
11:15 <ujjwal> has joined #xwiki  
11:20 <martinus\_\_> tmortagne, it  was my fault in the end. I had two authclass declared in xwiki.cfg .....  
11:20 <tmortagne> martinus\_\_: ok  
11:20 <tmortagne> great you found it :)  
11:22 <martinus\_\_> tmortagne, I guess I won't be able to user headers auth module in common with ldap auth... which means I won't be able to map LDAP groups from xwiki UI ... I have to dig into that  
11:22 <tmortagne> martinus\_\_: yes you would need an authenticator that combine the two  
11:37 <ClemensR> has joined #xwiki  
11:59 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
12:18 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
12:35 <jzhang> has joined #xwiki

12:57 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
13:13 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
13:21 <jzhang> has quit  
14:48 <M-mouhb> has joined #xwiki  
14:49 <evalica> has quit  
15:05 <tmortagne> [MYXWIKI] Upgrading myxwiki.org to 8.0 in 15 min  
15:16 <acotiuga> has quit  
15:18 <DarkKnightCZ> has quit  
15:23 <evalica> has joined #xwiki  
15:26 <tmortagne> takes quite a long time to check the version of a single database  
15:27 <tmortagne> makes migration take ages even when there is nothing to do  
15:27 <tmortagne> since it should be just about getting the current version is a single SQL request it seems very weird to me  
15:44 <msmeria> has quit  
15:48 <ujjwal> has quit  
15:51 <ujjwal> has joined #xwiki  
15:55 <boubou> has joined #xwiki  
16:11 <DarkKnightCZ> has joined #xwiki  
16:13 <tmortagne> [WARN] Restarting myxwiki.org  
16:33 <ujjwal> has quit  
16:33 <tmortagne> [WARN] Restarting myxwiki.org again (to disable deprecated warnings)  
16:35 <vmassol> you restarted myxwiki.org and not xwiki.org right? :)  
16:35 <vmassol> asking since xwiki.org is not repsonding for me just now  
16:35 <boubou> on XWiki Enterprise 7.0.1  
16:35 <boubou> how can I update to the latest ?  
16:35 <boubou> latest version\*  
16:36 <boubou> im using distrib Oracle Linux 7.2... Mostly Centos / RHEL 7  
16:39 <xwikibot> has joined #xwiki  
16:49 <boubou> anyone can explain me that ?  
16:49 <boubou> http://pastebin.com/CfELmsNc  
16:49 <boubou> does it looks like the install was botched ?  
16:49 <vmassol> tmortagne: I've created http://jira.xwiki.org/browse/XWIKI-13221 FYI  
16:50 <vmassol> hmm xwikibot is here but not working fine…  
16:50 <vmassol> boubou: deb upgrade? Sorry I'm not an expert on this, others here should be able to help you  
16:50 <boubou> vmassol centos  
16:50 <vmassol> well you have 2 versions of xwiki  
16:51 <vmassol> but I don't know what you did  
16:51 <vmassol> to get that  
16:51 <ujjwal> has joined #xwiki  
16:52 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: the drawer is thre since 5.3?  
16:52 <gdelhumeau> no, but they were a "home" entry in the top menu bar since 5.3  
16:53 <gdelhumeau> the drawer is just an other way to display it  
16:53 <vmassol> ok so the affects should 5.3, chznging  
16:53 <boubou> can I upgrade my xwiki from the gui ?  
16:53 <vmassol> gdelhumeau: personally I'd be ok but you could send a proposal on the list if you're not sure  
16:53 <vmassol> boubou: the upgrade process is at http://platform.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/AdminGuide/Upgrade  
16:53 <vmassol> 2 steps:  
16:54 <vmassol> - WAR upgrade (manual from shell)  
16:54 <vmassol> - page contnet upgrade (from UI)  
16:54 <vmassol> \*content  
16:54 <vmassol> (page content upgrade is done with the DW)  
16:55 <boubou> can I upgrade from 7.1 to 8 without any issue ?  
16:55 <boubou> 7.0.1\*  
16:56 <vmassol> it should work yes  
16:56 <vmassol> make sure to read the release notes though  
16:56 <vmassol> the only potential issue is Nested Spaces as indicated in the RN  
16:56 <boubou> I didnt install that xwiki so I miss some knowledge  
16:57 <vmassol> ok  
16:57 <ClemensR> I guess it should not create more issues than to 7.3, but better replace the old \*.war with the new one instead of having both in the same container  
17:00 <boubou> :S  
17:00 <boubou> ClemensR http://pastebin.com/CfELmsNc  
17:01 <boubou> what does it means ?  
17:01 <boubou> At the buttom of my wiki, its write This wiki is licensed under a Creative Commons 2.0 license  
17:01 <boubou> XWiki Enterprise 7.0.1 - Documentation  
17:01 <boubou> so it looks I wasnt update  
17:03 <boubou> can I delete the 7.3 one ?  
17:06 <ClemensR> you should not have both running at the same time, so better delete the newer one  
17:07 <ClemensR> I hope you have made backups of your database before upgrading?  
17:08 <boubou> Im running it on a VM  
17:08 <boubou> snapshot, vdp backups as well  
17:08 <ClemensR> I do not understand the directly structure of glassfish, I have to admin, I never worked with this servlet container  
17:08 <ClemensR> yes, vm snapshots are ok as backups, too, even preferable, file system backup included  
17:09 <boubou> exactly  
17:11 <ClemensR> to me it looks like the old wiki is reachable under a path like /xwiki-enterprise-web-7.0.1/bin/view/Main/  which is probably a not so ideal setup ...  
17:22 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
17:29 <lkrejci> has quit  
17:29 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
17:29 <lkrejci> vmassol: I'm running through xwiki-platform with the fixed revapi version at the moment.. if it succeeds, I'll do a release of revapi-java so that you can upgrade  
17:30 <vmassol> hey hi lkrejci, nice to see you here :)  
17:30 <vmassol> great thanks for all your help, you're aesome  
17:30 <vmassol> \*awesome  
17:30 <vmassol> :)  
17:30 <lkrejci> :)  
17:49 <vmassol> hmmm could anyone understand why on http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ActiveInstalls/?viewer=children#|t=childrenIndex&p=2&l=15 I see the page http://www.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/ActiveInstalls/XWikiVersionsDataAll listed in the LT but that page doesn't exist when I navigate to it?  
17:50 <evalica> has quit  
17:51 <Enygma`> has quit  
17:51 <helge> has joined #xwiki  
17:53 <ClemensR> strange, I do not see any pages there  
17:53 <vmassol> you don't see XWikiVersionDataAll in the LT ClemensR?  
17:53 <vmassol> (they're hidden pages)  
17:53 <ClemensR> nope, no childen at all, and none called XWikiVersionsDataAll either  
17:53 <ClemensR> ah, ok  
17:53 <ClemensR> that might explain it, one moment  
17:55 <ClemensR> ok, now I can reproduce  
17:57 <helge> Hi, after upgrade 7.1 → 8.0 I have an issue with solr search..  
17:57 <ClemensR> XWikiVersionsDataAll  is also in the search index, btw  
17:57 <helge> whenever I search something I should be redirected to Main.Search but I get "Page does not exist"  
17:58 <helge> I deleted the solr index as stated in the release notes  
17:58 <helge> any ideas someone?  
17:58 <lkrejci> has quit  
17:59 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
18:00 <vmassol> helge: so your Main.Search page doesn't exist  
18:00 <vmassol> could you check if the search extension is installed?  
18:01 <vmassol> xwiki-platform-search-ui to be precise  
18:01 <helge> but it is listed in the navigation  
18:01 <vmassol> (pretty name is "Search Application")  
18:01 <ClemensR> is Main.SolrSearch still there ?  
18:02 <helge> main.SolrSearch is there  
18:02 <helge> actually, is Main still there? I only see WikiName.SolrSearch  
18:03 <helge> Search Application and Solr Search Application are installed  
18:04 <vmassol> then Main.Search should exist  
18:04 <vmassol> unless someone removed it ofc :)  
18:05 <helge> wasen't there something in the config to omit Main?  
18:07 <vmassol> xwiki.defaultweb=Main  
18:07 <vmassol> in xwiki.cfg  
18:07 <helge> #-# Hide the /Space/ part of the URL when the space is the default one. Warning: use 1 to hide, 0 to show. xwiki.usedefaultweb=1  
18:08 <vmassol> but I don't think this would have any impact here  
18:08 <vmassol> just tell us what URL you get when his enter after typing in the search  
18:08 <vmassol> s/his/hitting  
18:10 <helge> e.g. https://test.qms.wiki/Search?text=create  
18:10 <helge> and ther is: The requested page could not be found. You can edit this page to create it.  
18:11 <vmassol> ahh indeed missing lots of stuff so you probably played with config options to shorten the URL  
18:11 <vmassol> you could have found a bug  
18:12 <helge> yes, I use urlrewrite and all the other tricks for short URLs  
18:12 <vmassol> you had it working before in 7.1?  
18:12 <helge> yes  
18:12 <vmassol> strange since we didn't change much for URLs I think  
18:12 <vmassol> would need a jira issue with the setup so that we can reproduce  
18:12 <vmassol> \*setup = config  
18:13 <helge> Ok, will do it. Meanwhile I skip short URLs and see if it is working without.  
18:13 <vmassol> k  
18:13 <vmassol> thx  
18:25 <KermitTheFragger> has quit  
18:28 <lkrejci> has quit  
18:29 <lkrejci> has joined #xwiki  
18:33 <MasterPiece> has quit  
18:35 <MasterPiece> has joined #xwiki  
18:35 <helge> vmassol: ok, found that you can not omit "Main" or search will break  
18:35 <helge> xwiki.usedefaultweb=0  
18:35 <helge> must not be xwiki.usedefaultweb=1 in xwiki.cfg  
18:36 <helge> So now I get the search page, but ...  
18:36 <gdelhumeau> has quit  
18:36 <helge> the velocity macro won't work  
18:36 <helge> Caused by: java.lang.IllegalArgumentException: The resolver parameter doesn't contain an Entity Reference of type [SPACE]  
18:37 <vmassol> "must not be xwiki.usedefaultweb=1 in xwiki.cfg" that's a bug, you shoud erport it  
18:37 <vmassol> \*report  
18:37 <helge> I will do in a minute  
18:38 <vmassol> re the velocity macro issue I don't have enough details to understan the problem  
18:39 <helge> http://pastebin.com/S0qZVvH9  
18:41 <vmassol> I think ir means that the reference passed to the resolver is not correct  
18:42 <helge> can I do something about it?  
18:42 <vmassol> that's probably due to some other config  
18:42 <vmassol> would need to debug the call to #handleSolrSearchRequest  
18:43 <sorinello> has quit  
18:44 <vmassol> probably a call to $services.solr.resolve()  
18:45 <vmassol> so printing the the passed argument should  help  
18:46 <vmassol> but that's not very easy for you to do  
18:46 <vmassol> so I guess adding this to the issue should be good enough  
18:46 <vmassol> but you need to provide all config options you 've used  
18:46 <vmassol> so that we can reproduce  
18:46 <vmassol> so what you can do  
18:46 <vmassol> is unset some config options you're using related to URLs  
18:46 <vmassol> (or rewrite)  
18:53 <sorinello> has joined #xwiki  
18:53 <sorinello> has joined #xwiki
